content:
I'm trying to connect to a FHIR endpoint using FHIR-NET-API but I'm getting an exception saying "Body is null"
When I run this request using POSTMAN or RestSharp it works fine.
Did anyone had an issue like this before?

Thanks
No...but can you post some more details? Maybe a snippet of the code you are using?
Or maybe the server endpoint for others to verify.

Luca, I did a full text search on my source code, and the only time "body is null" appears, it should be preceded by a text like "Operation was unsuccessful, and returned status YYYY.". Did you see that?
Which request are you doing? If you use Postman to trace the http traffic, maybe you see the API sends a request that is different from your manual ones?
